title: Deus Ex (PC)
description:
This is the classic, amazing game Deus Ex. It's old, it's dated, and probably buggy as hell (I play on PS2). Still my favorite game.

This game is not my rip/burn/crack/whatever. I found it on the net after a lot of searching, and I just wanted it available to whoever wanted to experience this great game in it's original form. So if you have a problem, it's not my fault. Enjoy.

File is served .rar at 400mb, extracts to 900MB. No install needed, just go into the "System" folder and click on "DeusEX". If you want to update the version or hack/mod the game, you'll have to Google for it. I'm done here.
